                                              int node,
                                              boolean[] reachable,
                                              java.lang.Integer[] parent)
Computes a path (no cycle allowed, BFS) from a set of nodes to a node.

Parameters:
frontier - the nodes we are starting from
node - the goal node
reachable - the set of reachable nodes
parent - a representation of the resulting path by an array of parent edges
Returns:
a path as a list of nodes

goal - the goal node
reachable - the set of reachable nodes
parent - a representation of the resulting path by an array of parent nodes

a boolean indicating if there is a path
